Title: Economic
Description: The goal is economic, such as formal employment and the local economy.

Title: Formal employment promotion
Description: The goal is to promote formal employment.

Title: Innovative purchase
Description: The goal is to procure innovative goods, services or works.

Title: Local economy promotion
Description: The goal is to promote the local economy.

Title: Market innovation promotion
Description: The goal is to promote market innovation.

Title: Process innovation promotion
Description: The goal is to procure goods, services or works that entail process innovation.

Title: Product innovation promotion
Description: The goal is to procure goods, services or works that entail product innovation.

Title: Research and development activities
Description: The goal is to procure goods, services or works that involve research and development activities.

Title: Environmental
Description: The goal is to minimize and, if possible, avoid environmental damage: for example, reducing CO2 emissions and waste or promoting resource reuse and energy efficiency.

Title: Biodiversity protection and restoration
Description: The goal is to protect and restore biodiversity and ecosystems.

Title: Carbon emissions reduction
Description: The goal is to reduce carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions.

Title: Circular economy
Description: The goal is to promote the transition to a circular economy.

Title: Climate change adaptation
Description: The goal is to promote climate change adaptation.

Title: Climate change mitigation
Description: The goal is to promote climate change mitigation.

Title: Energy efficiency
Description: The goal is to promote energy efficiency.

Title: Pollution prevention
Description: The goal is to prevent pollution.

Title: Recycling
Description: The goal is to promote recycling.

Title: Resource reuse
Description: The goal is to maximize the reuse of resources.

Title: Water resources protection
Description: The goal is to promote the sustainable use and protection of water and marine resources.

Title: Waste reduction
Description: The goal is to reduce waste.

Title: Social
Description: The goal is to generate benefits to society: for example, promoting labor rights, diversity and equal opportunity, and occupational health and safety.

Title: Accessibility
Description: The goal is to promote accessibility for disabled and not disabled persons.

Title: Disadvantaged employment opportunities
Description: The goal is to promote employment opportunities for the long-term unemployed, disadvantaged and/or for persons with disabilities.

Title: Ethnic equality
Description: The goal is to promote ethnic equality.

Title: Gender equality
Description: The goal is to promote gender equality.

Title: Human rights in supply chains
Description: The goal is to promote human rights due diligence in global supply chains.

Title: Labor rights promotion
Description: The goal is to promote labor rights.

Title: SME inclusion
Description: The goal is to promote the participation of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs).

Title: Women inclusion
Description: The goal is to promote the participation of women-owned suppliers.
